coreAttributes.name: Chocolate Coated Coffee Bean
coreAttributes.description: A metal tin of chocolate covered coffee beans, a niche candy for those who prefer the strong flavours of coffee and dark chocolate over sugary sweetness. On the bottom small print reads, "WARNING: EXTREMELY ALCOHOLIC TO SPIDERS," next to a picture of a flushed spider-girl winking at the reader... Is this really a warning?

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(take)] a handful of chocolate coated coffee beans and [npc.verb(crush)] it in [npc.her] [npc.mouth]. Unable to control [npc.herself], [npc.she] quickly [npc.verb(finish)] the entire tin. #IF(npc.getRace()==RACE_charisma_spider) Due to [npc.her] spider physiology, [npc.verb(start)] to feel [style.boldMinorBad(extremely drunk)]. #ENDIF
